linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
